functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"rangeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str2_luc1_hun2",display:{Name:"\"§6Sompteuse célérité\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Telles des étoiles filantes, \"}","{\"text\":\"§7fusent tes flèches.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Like shooting stars,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7your arrows are blasting.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§a2\"}"]},Damage:75,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:8s},{id:"minecraft:punch",lvl:4s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.7,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,50002,0,50001]}]}

{EquipmentType:"meleeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"harmonious",Effect:"str2_spd2_hun2",display:{Name:"\"§6Broyeuse d'espérance\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Sombre sont les heures qui virent l'éveil, noircies par le sang\"}","{\"text\":\"§7des persécuteurs du semi-immortel égaré.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Dark are the hours that saw the awakening, blackened by\"}","{\"text\":\"§7he blood of the persecutors of the lost half-immortal.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§a2 §7HUN§a2\"}"]},Damage:1250,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:2s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_damage,Name:generic.attack_damage,Amount:78.35,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.79,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:1.0,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,30002,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.01,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,30002,0,10000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str2_has3_hun1",display:{Name:"\"§6Cornes\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Surmonte ton crâne et insuffle stupeurs\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et cauchemars même aux plus mauvais.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Surmount your skull and breathe stupor\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and nightmares into even the worst.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a3 §7HUN§a1\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:5.26,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,10001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:1.3,Operation:1,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,20001,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str2_res1_luc1",display:{Name:"\"§6Aigle rayonnant\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Impérial, d'un unique mouvement\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'aile, il affirma sa supériorité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Imperial, with a single wing movement,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7he asserted his superiority.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1 §7LUC§a1\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:blast_protection",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:9.59,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:5.11,Operation:1,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,20000]}]}
